ServiceDescription: This API accesses QLD Government wildlife data that has been approved for public release.  There are a number of functions that retrieve species profiles, notes, statuses, images and locations.

Functions.Name: Get Kingdom Names
Functions.Description: Lists all of the kingdom names.

Varaibles.Name: f
Varaibles.Description: Format - Setting the 'f' varaible will determine the format of the response.  There are 4 possible options; json, xml, kml and csv.  Json is the default if 'f' is not set.  If the output is spatial, GeoJson will be return for 'f=json' and KML will be returned for 'f=xml' or 'f=kml'.
